name: engadget sans excess (Nov 2009 redesign fix)
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document 
  domain("engadget.com")
{

#adDiv,
#searchsubmit,
#adsDiv1,
#adsDiv0,
#topstories,
.archives_heading,
.about_button,
.col2_kirf,
.col2_game_changer,
.col2_stats,
.skyscraper,
#tipus_tab,
#hero_35,
#hero_38,
#cobrand_hdr,
#outerslice,
.topLeader,
.linkarea,
.footer,
#slTop,
.inpostad,
#slMiddle,
#gallery_ads,
.footer_copy,
#topic-hub-sponsor,
.engadget_hdr_classic,
.engadget_hdr_mobile,
.engadget_hdr_hd,
.sphere,
.my-little-hero,
.featured_posts,
.featured_on_header

{ display: none !important; }

.home { margin-top: 30px !important; margin-bottom: 30px !important; }

.col2_archives { margin-top: -32px !important; }

.searchform{  width: 294px !important; }

ul.pagination li.older { float: right !important; }

ul.pagination li.newer { float: left !important; }

.post_body > a > img,
.post_body > div > img, 
.post_body > div > a > img { max-width: 220px; float: right}


}
